name: Dave the Watcher
description:
This game was a submission for the 08-2022 Brackey's Game jam.

Theme: You're not Alone.

Overview

You find yourself in a factory (looking a lot like a tin bucket), guided by this mysterious person, Dave. But when Dave's true intentions are revealed, are you strong enough to survive in this short, comedic game?

Controls

Use WASD or ARROW KEYS to move and SPACE to jump. Right-Click to move forward through dialogue.
